name: THE BELOW
description:
Hello Muderer no. 0159. Welcome to the Below.

Sky Nakhorn is a world where instead of God dictating that sinners will go to Hell, it’s the government sending the convicted to the Below. 

It’s a world where the civilized city with orders is floating in the sky, while below is the land of chaos and dread. 

It’s also a world where things are clearly labeled as either right or wrong, but is it really the right way?

- This is a project by Panyapha Leekitwattana (Jib) for Parsons Game Design -
